019
020import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
021import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseMoney;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseRule;
023
024import java.math.BigDecimal;
025import java.util.HashMap;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.regex.Matcher;
028import java.util.regex.Pattern;
029
030/**
031 * RomanParseRule
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.4.0
035 */
036public class RomanParseRule implements ParseRule {
037
038  private static final Map<Character, Integer> ROMAN_VALUES = new HashMap<>();
039
040  static {
041    ROMAN_VALUES.put('I', 1);
042    ROMAN_VALUES.put('V', 5);
043    ROMAN_VALUES.put('X', 10);
044    ROMAN_VALUES.put('L', 50);
045    ROMAN_VALUES.put('C', 100);
046    ROMAN_VALUES.put('D', 500);
047    ROMAN_VALUES.put('M', 1000);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Retrieves an identifier.
052   *
053   * @return The identifier as a String.
054   */
055  @Override
056  public String identifier() {
057
058    return "roman";
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Applies the given parse money object to the input string according to the specified rules.
063   *
064   * @param parseMoney the ParseMoney object to apply the rules to
065   * @param input      the input string to apply the rules on
066   */
067  @Override
068  public String apply(final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String input) {
069
070    final Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile("^([^IVXLCDM]*)([IVXLCDM]+)").matcher(input);
071    if(matcher.find()) {
072
073      final String roman = matcher.group(2);
074      final int numericValue = romanToInteger(roman);
075      final BigDecimal value = new BigDecimal(numericValue);
076      parseMoney.amount(value);
077      return input.replaceFirst(roman, value.toPlainString()).trim();
078    }
079    return input;
080  }
081
082  private int romanToInteger(final String roman) {
083
084    int sum = 0;
085    int prevValue = 0;
086
087    for(int i = roman.length() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
088
089      final int value = ROMAN_VALUES.get(roman.charAt(i));
090
091      if(value < prevValue) {
092        sum -= value; // Subtraction case (e.g., IV = 4)
093      } else {
094        sum += value;
095      }
096
097      prevValue = value;
098    }
099    return sum;
100  }
101}
